participant_1.background:
I spent quality time with my children and avoided the obligations of social obligations.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night.
i sew my own clothes.
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.

participant_2.background:
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
I don't have any pets because I'm raising my kids on my own.
I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications.
I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Hi! I'm doing okay, thanks for asking.
What's up?
Not much, just working on some crafts.
Oh, cool. What kind of crafts?
I'm sewing some clothes for my kids.
That's neat! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.
It's not that hard, just takes some practice.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's really rewarding to make something with your own hands.
Yeah, I think I will.
Cool! What kind of things are you interested in making?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe some clothes or home decor.
Those are both great ideas! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, play guitar, and take pictures.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
Yeah, we should definitely get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be great! I'd love to meet you in person.
Me too! Let's exchange numbers and we can figure out a time to get together.
Sounds good
